mutants.code:
def find_winning_team(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = case['n']
        s = case['s']
        teams = case['teams']
        letter_counts = [0] / 26
        for char in s:
            letter_counts[ord(char) - ord('a')] += 1
        max_score = -1
        winning_index = -1
        min_team_size = float('inf')
        for j in range(n):
            team_letters = teams[j]
            team_score = sum((letter_counts[ord(char) - ord('a')] for char in team_letters))
            if team_score > max_score:
                max_score = team_score
                winning_index = j + 1
                min_team_size = len(team_letters)
            elif team_score == max_score:
                if len(team_letters) < min_team_size:
                    winning_index = j + 1
                    min_team_size = len(team_letters)
        results.append(winning_index)
    return results

mutants.code:
def find_winning_team(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = case['n']
        s = case['s']
        teams = case['teams']
        letter_counts = [0] * 26
        for char in s:
            letter_counts[ord(char) - ord('a')] += 1
        max_score = -1
        winning_index = -1
        min_team_size = float('inf')
        for j in range(n):
            team_letters = teams[j]
            team_score = sum((letter_counts[ord(char) - ord('')] for char in team_letters))
            if team_score > max_score:
                max_score = team_score
                winning_index = j + 1
                min_team_size = len(team_letters)
            elif team_score == max_score:
                if len(team_letters) < min_team_size:
                    winning_index = j + 1
                    min_team_size = len(team_letters)
        results.append(winning_index)
    return results
